document_data.name: Imperishable
document_data.mainbody: The '''Imperishable''' was an elite mamluk order who dedicated their lives to serving the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]].{{Cite dragon/268/Secrets of the Brotherhood of the True Flame}}
document_data.Activities: The primary goal of the Imperishable was defending the great fortress of [[Krak al-Mazhar]] from all enemies of the Brotherhood. The ranks were filled with slaves purchased as young children and indoctrinated throughout their lives to serve the Brotherhood. Upon reaching an age of retirement, if they survived that long, a mamluk of the Imperishable began training the younger mamluks of the order.
document_data.Organization: Unique among other mamluk orders who also tattooed their faces, the crimson tattoos of the Imperishable were actually special [[tattoo of power|tattoos of power]], granting them useful resistances to fire. Most of the members of the Imperishable dressed in red [[scale armor]] and white ''[[aba]]s''. They wore yellow silk sashes over one shoulder.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Imperishable were based in the fortress of Krak al-Mazhar located somewhere in the [[Great Anvil]].
